meanings.definition: A person with much worldly experience and knowledge of fashion and culture.
meanings.sent1: The sophisticated lady was known as one of the local sophisticates.
meanings.sent2: The group of sophisticates at the party discussed art and literature.
meanings.sent3: The young girl tried to act like a sophisticate by wearing oversized sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, she was a true sophisticate, always ahead of the trends.
meanings.sent5: The sophisticated gentleman's library was filled with books on art and history.

meanings.definition: To make more complex or refined.
meanings.sent1: She sophisticates her baking recipes by adding unique spices.
meanings.sent2: The chef decided to sophisticate the dish by garnishing it with edible flowers.
meanings.sent3: The students tried to sophisticate their science project by adding glitter.
meanings.sent4: He wanted to sophisticate his wardrobe by investing in tailored suits.
meanings.sent5: The artist used vibrant colors to sophisticate the painting and make it more appealing.
